name: Ruins Escape
description:
Ruins Escape is a thrilling and challenging game that puts you in the shoes of a character trapped in an ancient ruins complex.

The objective of the game is to help the character escape by jumping and avoiding obstacles while being chased by a giant ball that can crush him at any moment. The ruins are full of pitfalls and obstacles, and the only way to navigate them is by using the character's double-jumping skills. With every jump, you'll need to carefully plan your trajectory to avoid falling into the void or being caught by the ball.

The ball is constantly chasing you, adding to the excitement and intensity of the game. You'll need to be quick on your feet and think strategically to avoid getting crushed.

So, if you think you have what it takes to help the character escape the ruins and avoid the giant ball, then get ready to jump, dodge and run in Ruins Escape!
Game features :
- 29 skins for character
- Double jumping skill
- Deadly obstacles
